SCTX:
Begin poisonfoodScript

short messageOn
short button


if ( OnActivate == 1)
	if ( Player->GetItemCount "ingred_treated_bittergreen_uniq" >= 5 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex "DA_Mephala" == 40 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to place the poison in the pot?" "Yes." "No."
				set messageOn to 1
		endif
	endif
endif

if ( messageOn == 1)

	set button to GetButtonPressed

	if ( button >= 0 )
		set messageOn to 0
	endif

	if ( button == 0 )		
		Player->RemoveItem "ingred_treated_bittergreen_uniq" 5	
		Journal "DA_Mephala" 50

	elseif ( button == 1 )
			set button to 0
	endif

endif


End
